listitem.para: This release removes several obsoleted and redundant classes and templates. &ns;::dir and &ns;::dirwalk classes are removed, they were made redundant by the filesystem library. &ns;::xml::quote_string_literal is obsoleted by &ns;::xml::escapestr(), added &ns;::xml::xpathescapestr() for quoting literal strings in XPath expressions.
Minor API changes to several interfaces, that use move semantics.
